user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill my need for comfortable, supportive undergarments that would provide ease of wear throughout the day, especially under various types of clothing.
purchase_reason: I was drawn to this product primarily because of its exceptional comfort and softness, which was highlighted in the description and my own experience. The fabric's ability to wick moisture and the design features that provide support without wires were significant factors in my decision. I wanted something that would feel good against my skin and provide all-day comfort, especially under fitted clothing.

Similar to my previous purchase, I was motivated by the promise of comfort and support. The description emphasized the innovative fabric and design that molds to my shape, which appealed to my need for a bra that would not only be comfortable but also functional. The seamless construction and versatility of the convertible straps were also key features that influenced my decision.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer comfort, durability, and a good fit. I value high-quality materials that feel soft against the skin, such as cotton and synthetic blends that provide breathability and moisture-wicking properties. I appreciate items that are versatile and can be used for various occasions, whether it's casual wear or more formal settings. Additionally, I tend to favor products that have functional features, like pockets for convenience or adjustable elements for a better fit. On the other hand, I dislike items that do not maintain their quality after washing, such as those that shrink significantly or lose their shape. I also find it unappealing when products lack sufficient functionality, like not having enough pockets or being difficult to wear comfortably.

conversation.content: I want comfortable, supportive undergarments for all-day wear under different clothing. within my expected price range: [12.99, 18.99]
What specific type of undergarments are you looking for? (e.g., briefs, boxers, bras, etc.)
I am looking for comfortable and supportive bras.
What size range do you typically wear in bras to ensure the comfort and support you are looking for?
I typically wear sizes 34B to 36C in bras for the comfort and support I need.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's Panties, Cotton Brief Underwear Multi-Pack (Retired Options)> / Item ID: B0BRJSSTPD / Price: $17.44 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["If briefs are your style, you can't do better than Hanes® best lightweight cotton briefs. This comfy brief underwear is made with Hanes® Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks away moisture from your skin to keep you cool and dry all day. Plus these undies are made of ring-spun cotton that's oh so soft against your skin. You'll also appreciate the plush waistband that won't pinch or bind. The silhouette is a classic brief with full coverage in front and back plus a high-rise waist for a sleek, smooth look under clothes. These lightweight briefs have comfort leg bands that stay in place without riding up and are available in a convenient 3-pack of assorted colors. Even better, these classic brief undies are tagless for itch-free comfort."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's Sporty Cotton Assorted Boyshort Underwear> / Item ID: B0BB767B8M / Price: $10.49 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["The Hanes Women's Cotton Boyshort Underwear come in a convenient pack of 6 pairs. They offer it all-comfort, fit and style. You'll also love features like the breathable ultra soft ring spun cotton and an ultra soft, plush back waistband that won't pinch or bind and no-ride-up leg bands that stay in place. Plus, tag-free label means freedom from annoying, scratchy tags. Designed with excellent coverage, these panties come in an assorted color pack, colors may be different than shown in the image. The boyshort style provides full coverage front and back.. Don't compromise on comfort, style and fit, when you can have all three with the Hanes Women's Cotton Boyshort Underwear."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Rosette Women’s Sleeveless Undershirt - Cotton – High Neck, Full shoulder design> / Item ID: B07BTSGMCV / Price: $11.98 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Tops Tees & Blouses', 'Tanks & Camis'] / Description: ['From the cradle to the coffin, underwear comes first!', 'As underwear is hidden beneath clothing, it is easy to believe that it does not require much forethought and that anything will do. But that is untrue, you not only need something that looks nice, but more importantly something that offers ultimate comfort.Your underwear should feel good and not distract from activity your taking part in.', 'GENERAL FEATURES:', 'Made of 100% Extra fine durable, soft Cotton for superior comfort Classic fit, perfect for layering Available in many sizes & colors (Check size chart above) Full shoulder design for a conservative appearance High neckline for a Modest Coverage Machine wash warm. Tumble dry low', 'Comfort + Quality + Style', "The Rosette Sleeveless Tank Top Undershirt is a must-have in any women's closet. The extra soft cotton material allows for all day wear during any type of activity, whether you're at the office or at home.Full shouldered tank straps conceal bra straps for a more put together look. With high neckline, great for anyone looking for extended coverage. They are very stretchy with a Nice ribbon trim around the neck and arms.", 'Natural Cotton – Eco-Friendly', 'Ideal for women with Sensitive skin and Sensory issues. Great for Sleeping, Lounging, Pajamas and Just for layering, or plain wearing clean finish bottom to wear tucked in or tucked out with the everyday essentials.', 'Get it, Feel it, Prove it!', 'Get the Rosette’s top rated tank shirt for ladies and girls today by clicking “Add to Cart” on top of the page and feel the difference.']
